fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm failover alert banner and actions
fields.request_details: Force the node into failover mode by writing a JSON payload to locks/auto_upgrade_failover.lck (reason/detail text is sufficient). Log into the Django admin and confirm the persistent banner appears above other messages with the failure detail and a working link to the upgrade report. Use the Dismiss button to remove the banner and verify the lockfile is deleted. Recreate the lock and click Retry upgrade; ensure you are redirected back to the same page, the upgrade check success message is shown, and the lockfile remains for the next health check.
